message: The beginning notes of this songs reminds me so much how we learnt it together
prompt: A nostalgic scene at twilight with two young people seated close together on a park bench, surrounded by softly glowing lanterns, sharing a single pair of headphones connected to an old music player, gently swaying to a melody, reflecting a warm, intimate, and reminiscent mood. Autumn leaves gently falling around them, enhancing the serene and tender atmosphere.
lyrics:
ಅನಿಸುತಿದೆ ಯಾಕೋ ಇಂದು, ನೀನೇನೆ ನನ್ನವಳೆಂದು 
 ಮಾಯದ ಲೋಕದಿಂದ, 
 ನನಗಾಗಿ ಬಂದವಲೆಂದು 
 ಆಹಾ ಎಂತ ಮಧುರ ಯಾತನೆ 
 ಕೊಲ್ಲು ಹುಡುಗಿ ಒಮ್ಮೆ ನನ್ನ 
 ಹಾಗೆ ಸುಮ್ಮನೇ 
 ಅನಿಸುತಿದೆ ಯಕೋ ಇಂದು 
 ಸುರಿಯುವ ಸೋನೆಯು ಸೂಸಿದೆ ನಿನ್ನದೇ ಪರಿಮಳ 
 ಇನ್ಯಾರ ಕನಸಲೂ ನೀನು ಹೋದರೆ ತಳಮಳ 
 ಪೂರ್ಣ ಚಂದಿರ ರಜ ಹಾಕಿದ ನಿನ್ನಯ ಮೊಗವನು ಕಂಡ ಕ್ಷಣ 
 ನಾ ಖೈದಿ ನೀನೇ ಸೆರೆಮನೆ 
 ತಬ್ಬಿ ನನ್ನ ಅಪ್ಪಿಕೋ ಒಮ್ಮೆ 
 ಹಾಗೆ ಸುಮ್ಮನೇ 
 ಅನಿಸುತಿದೆ ಯಾಕೋ ಇಂದು 
 ತುಟಿಗಳ ಹೂವಲಿ ಆಡದ ಮಾತಿನ ಸಿಹಿ ಇದೆ 
 ಮನಸಿನ ಪುಟದಲೀ ಕೇವಲ ನಿನ್ನದೇ ಸಹಿ ಇದೆ 
 ಹಣೆಯಲಿ ಬರೆಯದ ನಿನ್ನ ಹೆಸರ ಹೃದಯದಿ ನಾನೇ ಕೊರೆದಿರುವೆ 
 ನಿನಗುಂಟೆ ಇದರ ಕಲ್ಪನೇ 
 ನನ್ನ ಹೆಸರ ಕೂಗೇ ಒಮ್ಮೆ 
 ಹಾಗೆ ಸುಮ್ಮನೇ 
 ಅನಿಸುತಿದೆ ಯಾಕೋ ಇಂದು 
 ನೀನೇನೆ ನನ್ನವಳೆಂದು 
 ಮಾಯದ ಲೋಕದಿಂದ ನನಗಾಗಿ ಬಂದವಳೆಂದು 
 ಆಹಾ ಎಂತ ಮಧುರ ಯಾತನೆ 
 ಕೊಲ್ಲು ಹುಡುಗಿ ಒಮ್ಮೆ ನನ್ನ 
 ಹಾಗೆ ಸುಮ್ಮನೇ 
 ಅನಿಸುತಿದೆ ಯಕೋ ಇಂದು

message: This I just can't tell how much I'm into it. Back in the days it was like when ever I think of you the radio was playing this song as a perfect BGM. I have got a very special relation ship with this song about you
prompt: Capturing a magical, heartfelt moment, an illustrated couple walking down a moonlit cobblestone street, with a vintage radio magically floating beside them, softly playing a melody. The surrounding quaint town buildings are bathed in a golden glow from street lamps, casting long shadows. The couple is lost in each others eyes, encapsulating a deep, emotional connection that resonates with the song's intimate and nostalgic vibes. Leaves swirl around their feet, adding to the enchantment of the scenery.

message: This song has been like a default song for us through out when ever we slept. An extreamly exquisite song and wherever or when ever i hear this song, it puts me into a different mood altogether. The lyrics are for you...
prompt: A serene and dreamlike scene featuring a couple lying on a lush, green meadow under a starry sky, completely absorbed in the moment with a vintage phonograph playing softly beside them. The grass around them is dotted with wildflowers that gently sway in a soft breeze. Fireflies create a magical glow around them, illuminating their faces with a soft light, reflecting peace and ethereal beauty. The scene captures the essence of tranquility, love, and the profound impact of a cherished song that transports them to another world.
lyrics:
ತೂಗು ಮಂಚದಲ್ಲಿ ಕೂತು ಮೇಘ ಶ್ಯಾಮ ರಾಧೆಗಾತು 
 ಆಡುತಿಹನು ಏನೋ ಮಾತು ‌‌ 
 ರಾಧೆ ನಾಚುತಿದ್ದಳು 
 ಸೆರಗ ಬೆರಳಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಸುತ್ತಿ 
 ಜಡೆಯ ತುದಿಯ ಕೆನ್ನೆಗೊತ್ತಿ 
 ಜುಮ್ಮುಗುಡುವ ಮುಖವನೆತ್ತಿ 
 ಕಣ್ಣಮುಚ್ಚುತಿದ್ದಳು 
 ತೂಗು ಮಂಚದಲ್ಲಿ ಕೂತು… 
 ಮುಖವ ಎದೆಯ ನಡುವೆ ಒತ್ತಿ 
 ತೋಳಿನಿಂದ ಕೊರಳ ಸುತ್ತಿ 
 ತುಟಿಯು ತೀಡಿ ಬೆಂಕಿ ಹೊತ್ತಿ ಅಮ್ಮನುಸಿರ ಬಿಟ್ಟಳೂ 
 ಸೆರಗು ಜಾರುತಿರಲು ಕೆಳಗೆ 
 ಬಾನು ಭೂಮಿ ಮೇಲು ಕೆಳಗೆ 
 ಅದುರುತಿರುವ ಅದರಗಳಿಗೆ ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಹಾಲ ಬಟ್ಟಲು 
 ತೂಗು ಮಂಚದಲ್ಲಿ ಕೂತು…..

message: You once recorded this song for me by singing it through out. I have listened to this so many times on my way to home and office.your recording was very much close to the original and was excellent.
prompt: A contemporary scene showing a person wearing headphones, deeply immersed in listening to a song on a crowded early morning city train. They have a gentle, reminiscent smile while looking out the train window, reflecting cityscapes passing by. In their lap is a smartphone displaying an audio wave visualization, symbolizing a personal recording. The train interior is softly lit by the sunrise, casting a warm, comforting glow around the listener, embodying a personal oasis amid the morning rush, filled with emotional depth and appreciation for a beloved voice.
lyrics: gundelona nindukunna ne gurthu leka oopirayye innalu kallolona nippukunna ne rupamega ooratayye Innalu cheppani cheppani manasu thalaledhani ne doorame thappane thappani thaapame theerani eenaade gundelona nindukunna ne gurthu leka oopirayye innalu ne aadugulona adugu kalipi praname muravani na anuvvu annuvvu ninnu cheri thanivi theerani aa dhari malupu loni enka vedane vedani ne loni needa nenulaga nannu marani thimiram thera tholigipoyi velige nava oodayale pranam chey jari malli cheraga thana thirane kammanaina oo hayivana kuravaga ela chirunavvulona gundelona nindukunna ooosulanni cheeppukoga eennadu kallalona dhachukunna premanantha chupukoga ennadu aagani aagani aadhamarupule kada ika anni dhoorame annanu kougilinthale kada ika anni gundelona nindukunna premanantha chupukoga eenaadu paravasham paravasham avvani mana vasham chilakarunchu navvulu manaki e jagam cheru sagam cheru sagam avvaga oo sumam palakarinche aashale hrudayanandanam alaale jolalanu padi aalupe marichene kalale ne odini vali nijamey merisene alluthunna harivillu lona andukoga swarga seema gundelona nindukunna premanantha chupukoga eenaadu aagani aagani aadhamarupule kada ika anni dhoorame annanu kougilinthale kada ika anni gundelona nindukunna premanantha chupukoga eenaadu

message: This entire movie songs for some reason felt like magic recreated for us. I love it especially because you see me in the movie. and these lyrics exactly converys my feeling for you at this very moment of our life. I love you and will take care of all of us.I love you moreee...
prompt: A romantic and cinematic scene of a couple slow dancing in an elegantly decorated living room, lit only by the warm, soft glow of a fireplace and scattered candles. The room is filled with luxurious vintage decor, reflecting a timeless elegance. Through a large window, the moon casts a silvery light, adding a magical, dreamlike quality. The couple is deeply engrossed in each other’s eyes, expressing profound love and commitment, while a gentle melody seems to envelop them, enhancing the mood of deep affection and life-long promise. Surrounding them, the shadows and light dance together, creating a captivating, enchanting atmosphere.
lyrics:
అడిగా అందాల చిన్ని చినుకులనే 
 పిడుగే రానుంది అని తెలియకనే 
 పిలిచా ఏడేడు రంగు తళుకులనే 
 నలుపే చేరింది విధినా 
 ఏమైనా తప్పంతా నాదేలే 
 చూపించా కలలే 
 నీకిచ్చా దిగులే 
 మనసా మన్నించుమంటూ ఆడగనులే 
 తెలిసే ఇంకొక్క సారి జరగదులే 
 కనులై కన్నీరు ఇంకి నిలిచెనులే 
 తెలుపే దిద్దేటి సమ్మతే 
 
 హృదయం తెరిచా 
 మనసే గెలిచా 
 ఒకటై నిలిచా శుబమే తలచా 
 బ్రతకనలే నీలా పరాయిలా వినవా 
 అడిగా అందాల చిన్ని చినుకులనే 
 పిడుగే రానుంది అని తెలియకనే 
 పిలిచా ఏడేడు రంగు తళుకులనే 
 నలుపే చేరింది విధినా 
 ఏమైనా తప్పంతా నాదేలే 
 చూపించా కలలే 
 నీకిచ్చా దిగులే
